pullrequest.title: Add new tag measure_direction to force_torque sensor

content.raw: Should we consider adding the `joint` frame as an option for the `frame` element? The joint frame is defined by a pose offset from the child link frame, and is used to specify the joint anchor point and axis direction (as of 1.5).
content.html: Should we consider adding the joint frame as an option for the frame element? The joint frame is defined by a pose offset from the child link frame, and is used to specify the joint anchor point and axis direction (as of 1.5).
